net.maritimecloud.mms

Interface WithBroadcast


  • public interface WithBroadcast

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WithBroadcast onRemoteReceive(Consumer<? super BroadcastListener.Context> consumer)
      The specified consumer will be invoked every time a remote party has received the broadcast message.
      MmsFuture<Void> send()
      Dispatches the broadcast.
      WithBroadcast toArea(Area area)
      Sets the area for which the broadcast will be visible to other actors.
      WithBroadcast toArea(int radius)
      Sets the radius (in meters) for which the broadcast will be visible to other actors.

    • Method Detail

      • toArea

        WithBroadcast toArea(Area area)
        Sets the area for which the broadcast will be visible to other actors. The area is not relative to the current position of the client. Any area set by this method will override any radius set by toArea(int).
        Parameters:
        area - the area to broadcast to
        Returns:
        this option object

      • toArea

        WithBroadcast toArea(int radius)
        Sets the radius (in meters) for which the broadcast will be visible to other actors. The radius is relative to the current position of the client. If an area is set via toArea(Area) this will override any radius set by this method.

        Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking toArea(Area) with a circle with the specified radius.

        Parameters:
        radius - the radius in meters
        Returns:
        this option object

      • onRemoteReceive

        WithBroadcast onRemoteReceive(Consumer<? super BroadcastListener.Context> consumer)
        The specified consumer will be invoked every time a remote party has received the broadcast message.

        This is done on a best effort basis. For example, a remote actor might loose Internet connectivity after having received the broadcast but before an acknowledge message can be send.

        Parameters:
        consumer - the consumer of each acknowledgment
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the messages has not been sent with receiver acknowledgment enabled

      • send

        MmsFuture<Void> send()
        Dispatches the broadcast.
        Returns:
        a future indicating when the broadcast has been succesfully delivered to the server.
